Package by.roma.telecom.service

Interface AccountService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountServiceImpl
    public interface AccountService
    AccountService is the main interface to provide guidelines for an account data manipulation and CRUD pathways.
    Since:
    10-18-2019
    Author:
    Roman

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Account addCallPlan​(java.lang.String accountID, java.lang.String callPlanID)
      Executes Insert query, across two tables, updates and returns account bean object.
      Account blockAccount​(java.lang.String accountID)
      Executes Update query, accounts table involved, updates and returns account bean object.
      Account changePhoneNumber​(java.lang.String accountID, java.lang.String newPhoneNumber)
      Executes Insert, Update, Select queries, several tables involved, updates and returns account bean object.
      Account chargeToAccount​(java.lang.String accountID, float amount)
      Executes Update query, accounts table involved, updates and returns account bean object.
      Account connectPhoneNumber​(java.lang.String accountID, java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Executes Insert query, across two tables, updates and returns account bean object.
      Account findAccountByPhoneNumber​(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Executes Select query, several tables involved, returns account bean object.
      Account getAccountDetails​(java.lang.String accountID)
      Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean account as an object, information gathered across several tables in data base.
      java.util.List<Account> getListOfAllAccounts()
      Executes Select query, several tables involved, returns list of all active accounts from DB.
      Account unblockAccount​(java.lang.String accountID)
      Executes Update query, accounts table involved, updates and returns account bean object.

      • getAccountDetails

        Account getAccountDetails​(java.lang.String accountID)
                   throws ServiceException
        Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean account as an object, information gathered across several tables in data base.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account ID as a String.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If DAOExeption occurs.
